name: Power of words
description:
hi guys!

this is my submission to the 79 miniJam - frogs.

it uses a mechanic where the player jumps towards the cursor.

the game is deeply inspired by a fable - "power of words", sometimes called two frogs, but I like "power of words" more.

in the game you play as a frog, and try to jump out of a deep pit. it can be challenging, but don't give up! remember that sometimes moving backwards is the best way to move forward.  think every step, use short jumps to get a little more space  when you think  you can' t jump far enough, and aim high! (seriously. always put your cursor at the high end of the screen to avoid frustration.  trust me.)

its kinda sad but I had only 2 spare days to work on this project, so one jam day is wasted. and sadly I will not be able to play and rate other games before rating period is over.

ho, and why the frog can't flip? coding is hard.

hope you all have a great day, and have fun!
